replies.body: In the DLC pack for Half-Life 3.
Probably with "free Unchained Alistar skin" - available to NA but not OCE. :-/
You can get Unchained Alsitar for free on OCE though.
But you can't, you simply can't
I guess the fact I've done so on two accounts means nothing then.

I wish they're at least give us an insight in to their progress. 
Such as a tease at possible champion or themes.
Tell me, why does OCE deserve a skin? When no other server has a unique skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0n7XMVU1,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-17T05:50:30.841+0000)
>
> Tell me, why does OCE deserve a skin? When no other server has a unique skin.

No servers have 'unique' skins per say, but skins are released to celebreate their opening. I do believe Sultan Tryndamere and/or Sultan Gangplank were server skins (not sure which server exactly) and also Muay Thai Lee Sin (Thailand server)

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0n7XMVU1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-03-17T06:03:48.329+0000)

Pretty sure we got pool party ziggs. One of the severs got anivia so we're not the short end of the stick at least. :)

we're not. accept it.

What are you basing this on?
Riot are so careful about what information they release; and they've said it's coming.
So unless there's an official word otherwise, why think different.
Also if they did take back their original word, we'd probably be compensated in some other way.
do you guys honestly believe we're getting one?
Yes.
what makes you think we are? riot have gone back on their word multiple times. still no replay system, still no effective method of stopping people from afking, still no OCE skin after 20 odd months.
skin doesn't even symbolise oce in anyway lmao
